com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j.Account

  • public class Account
extends Object
    Class representing a single Nano account
    Author:
    Koen De Voegt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Account(String accountKey)
      Construct the Account using either an address or a public key

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAddress()
      Returns the address of the account
      BigInteger getBalance()
      Returns how many RAW is owned by this account
      int getBlockCount()
      Get number of blocks for a specific account
      List<HistoryItem> getHistory(int... count)
      Returns the last count history items for this account, defaults to 5 items
      AccountInfo getInfo()
      Returns frontier, open block, change representative block, balance, last modified timestamp from local database & block count for account.
      AccountInfo getInfo(boolean representative, boolean weight, boolean pending)
      Returns frontier, open block, change representative block, balance, last modified timestamp from local database & block count for account.
      BigInteger getPending()
      Returns how many RAW have not yet been received by this account
      String getPublicKey()
      Returns the public key of the account
      String getRepresentative()
      Returns the representative for this account
      BigInteger getWeight()
      Returns the voting weight for account

      • getInfo

        public AccountInfo getInfo()
        Returns frontier, open block, change representative block, balance, last modified timestamp from local database & block count for account.
        Returns:
        An AccountInfo object containing the requested information

      • getInfo

        public AccountInfo getInfo(boolean representative,
                           boolean weight,
                           boolean pending)
        Returns frontier, open block, change representative block, balance, last modified timestamp from local database & block count for account. Optionally returns representative, voting weight, pending balance for account
        Parameters:
        representative - Include the representative in the AccountInfo object
        weight - Include the weight in the AccountInfo object
        pending - Include the pending in the AccountInfo object
        Returns:
        An AccountInfo object containing the requested information

      • getHistory

        public List<HistoryItem> getHistory(int... count)
        Returns the last count history items for this account, defaults to 5 items
        Parameters:
        count - Either one or no Integer, the amount of history items wanted
        Returns:
        The last 5 history items for this account

      • getRepresentative

        public String getRepresentative()
        Returns the representative for this account
        Returns:
        The representative for this account
